fields.name: txtEditShiptoCompleted

fields.name: txtFail
fields.fieldText:
You are unable to create a new customer/supplier.

Please contact the administrator.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_txtFailNewCustomer
fields.fieldText:
New ship-to '{!getRequestItem.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.CompanyNameENF__c}' creation failed.

Please recheck your information and submit again.

fields.name: txtFailEditShipto
fields.fieldText:
Ship-to '{!getRequestItem.CTRRequestFormHeader__r.CompanyNameENF__c}' modification failed.

Please recheck your information and submit again.

fields.name: txtFailNewAdditional
fields.fieldText:

fields.name: txtFailNewCustomer

fields.name: txtFailNewPurchasing

fields.name: txtFailNewShipto

fields.name: txtFailNewSupplier
